page.title: 04ADULT ORGANISATIONS
page.content: Within Greens Norton there are the following- Womens Institute Thursday Club Action Research for the Crippled Child Garden and Flower Club Adult Education Lace Making Circle Football Club Cricket Club Wednesday Club (O.A.P.) Home Close Social Club (Elderly Club) Blind and Handicapped British Legion The 50+ Club - This was established two years ago and is a thriving organisation with many and varied interests e.g. country walks, table- tennis,boule and assisting any worth- while cause within the village community.
